resources.string: Please copy update package (update.zip) to image directory on storage card, then click OK button.
Do not find update package (update.zip) on storage card, please confirm that update package has been copied to image directory on storage card!
Do you want to update now?
Do not find update package (update.zip) on phone storage, please confirm that update package has been copied to root directory on phone storage!
Do not find update package (update.zip) on external SD card, please confirm that update package has been copied to root directory on external SD card!
Please make sure external SD card is mounted, and then try it again!

"1. Please copy update package (update.zip) to root directory on phone storage or external SD card. 2. According to the actual location of update package, select right menu below the tip to update your system."
"1. Please copy update package (update.zip) to root directory on phone storage. 2. Click system update menu below the tip to update your system."

"1. If you want to update system from external SD card, please insert your external SD card. If you only want to update system from phone storage, please do not insert your external SD card. 2. Copy update package (update.zip) to root directory on phone storage or external SD card. 3. Click system update menu below the tip to update your system."
Please copy update package to root directory on storage card,then click OK button.
Do not find update package on storage card,please confirm that update package has been copied to root directory on storage card!
Update package is not matching, please check!
System is busy,please reboot system and try again!
Sorry, you can not update while charging.
Battery level is low,and can not update.
Find matched update package, do you want to update?
